passive.name: JOY UNENDING
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) JOY UNENDING
                                After an attack crits, Nilah heals herself for 20% of the damage dealt. Excess healing is converted into an equivalent amount of shield that lasts 6 seconds.

q.name: (Q) FORMLESS BLADE
q.description:
(Q) FORMLESS BLADE
 4s   30 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Gains 35% of current Critical Strike Chance as Armor Penetration.Active: Nilah cracks her whip-blade in a straight line, dealing 63 physical damage (10/15/20/25 + 90/100/110/120% )  to enemies hit. Every 1% Critical Rate increases damage by 1%.After Formless Blade hits an enemy, Nilah gains 10% Attack Speed () and 125 bonus Attack Range. Her attacks also deal 100% physical damage to enemies in a cone for 4 seconds reduced by 80% against non-champion.When Formless Blade is cast during Slipstream, Nilah leaves behind a wave that is sent towards her at the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies hit.Deals 25% damage to monsters.

w.name: (W) JUBILANT VEIL
w.description:
(W) JUBILANT VEIL
 21/20/19/18s   45 
                                
                                
                                Nilah envelops herself in mist for 1.75 seconds, during witch she gains 15/20/25/30% Movement Speed, reduces incoming magic damage taken by 25% and becomes immune to non-tower attacks. If there are allied champions nearby, the nearest allied champion gains the same effects, and the duration of the effects Nilah gained is extended by 1 second.
notes: duration of the effects Nilah gained is extended by 1 second

e.name: (E) SLIPSTREAM
e.description:
(E) SLIPSTREAM
 18/16/14/12s   40 
                                
                                
                                Nilah dashes forward for a fixed distance, dealing 82 physical damage (70/100/130/160 + 20% ) to any enemies that she passes through. Empowered attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1 second. Cooldown is further reduced by 1 second after hitting a champion. Hitting any unit will also refresh this ability's cooldown.Cooldown cannot be refreshed again within 10 seconds.If no unit was hit, immediately enters cooldown.

r.name: (R) APOTHEOSIS
r.description:
(R) APOTHEOSIS
 80/70/60s   80 
                                
                                
                                Nilah whirls her whip-blade, dealing 60 physical damage (60/120/180 + 140% bonus ) continuously over 1 second and reducing the enemy's Movement Speed by 10% for 3 seconds.When keeping her whip-blade, Nilah also deals 125 physical damage (125/225/325 +120% bonus ) and pulls nearby enemies toward her. Nilah also heals herself and nearby allied champions by 20% of the damage (20% + 30% ) that she dealt to enemy champions. Excess healing is converted into a shield that lasts 6 seconds.Non-champion units are healed by 10% instead.
